description: A sweet, sticky jam with nutty and smoky flavours.
keywords: Preserves,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Cherry,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cherry Jam Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sterilise a suitable jam jar by cleaning with boiled water and set to one side to cool. In a non-stick pan on a medium heat, fry the cherries while tossing for 5 minutes until they start to soften.
Once they start to soften, mash them using a potato masher or other suitable tool. Add the sugar to the pan and mix thoroughly until the sugar has melted completely.

Add the lime juice to the pan, cook out for a further 2 minutes or until it reaches a thick consistency. Mash thoroughly. Remove from the heat, allow to cool slightly and transfer to your sterilised sealable jar and store in the fridge.
